text: Adrian Armand Bărar (15 January 1960 – 8 March 2021) was a Romanian guitarist and composer. He was the founder of the Heavy metal band Cargo. Bărar died of COVID-19 on 8 March 2021 in his hometown of Timișoara during the COVID-19 pandemic in Romania at the age of 61. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Romanian composers Category:Guitarists Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Romania
title: Adrian Bărar
